name: 随想小说
request: http://book.suixw.com/modules/article/search.php?searchtype=articlename&searchkey=[$key]&page=[$page]@charset->gbk@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/85.0.4183.83 Safari/537.36

search.list: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){var myArray=new Array();myArray.push(html);return myArray;};return jsoups(html,'#content > tr:gt(0)');}
search.title: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'tr > td:nth-child(1) > span');};return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(1) > a');}
search.introduction: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'#content > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(2)');};return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(5)');}
search.cover: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'tr > td:nth-child(1) > img@attr->src');};return null;}
search.url: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('TXT下载')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'div.main.m_top > div.fr > a:nth-child(1)@attr->href');};return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(1) > a@attr->href');}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2)');}
detail.introduction: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(2)');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(1)');}
detail.catalog_url: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#content > div:nth-child(5) > div > span:nth-child(1) > fieldset > div > a@attr->href');}
